thread.section_title: The Gallivant Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another wonderful experience
thread.title_full: Another wonderful experience - Review of The Gallivant Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: PJSander
title: Another wonderful experience
text: The staff, particularly Suny and Adelina, are friendly and accommodating. It is wonderful to be greeted so warmly after a long day of travel. The rooms are spacious, by NYC standards, and well equipped. The location is PRIME - just a few steps from the heart of Times Square. The Gallivant will always be my first choice for accommodations in the city.
